name: Hanabi
tagline: exploring artificial cooperative communication through digital firework detonation
body:
# hanabi
This repository is meant to serve as a foundation for developing algorithms that cooperate to play Hanabi, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanabi_(card_game).

### external references
Osawa H., 2015. Solving Hanabi: Estimating Hands by Opponent's Actions_
_in Cooperative Game with Incomplete Information. http://www.aaai.org/ocs/index.php/WS/AAAIW15/paper/viewFile/10167/10193
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
